You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &cupcap;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&CupCap;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/224d/index.htm U+0224D].
  * `&cupcap;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2a46/index.htm U+02A46].
